statements: UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 150.75, status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = '56abf79f-38b0-4c37-bb84-fd8fd78a8f7e';

UPDATE payments SET amount = 500.75, payment_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE payment_id = 1001;

UPDATE transactions SET status = 'completed', timestamp = '2022-01-15 14:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payments SET description = 'Payment for Service A', amount = 1000.50 WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET status = 'Completed', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE transaction_id = '456e7890-f12c-34a5-b678-c901234567de';
UPDATE payment_transactions SET transaction_amount = 250.00, payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE user_details SET user_balance = user_balance - 50.00 WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE payment_transactions SET transaction_amount = 150.75, transaction_date = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE user_details SET user_name = 'John Doe', user_email = 'john.doe@example.com', user_balance = 500.00 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 150.25, transaction_time = '2022-01-10 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE users SET email = 'example@email.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 1000, description = 'Bonus Added' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE orders SET quantity = quantity - 1, order_time = '2022-10-31 08:00:00' WHERE order_id = 54321;
